features.name: Martial Advantage
features.description: You deal an additional 6 damage to a creature you hit with a weapon attack. The creature must be within 5 ft. of an ally that isn't incapacitated.

features.name: Paragon Power
features.description:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain one reaction and choose one of the following:
A. Act: Take an action. You may also spend some or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
B. Resist: Reroll a saving throw against an ongoing effect. Spend 12 hit points to gain advantage on the roll.

features.name: Raise Shield
features.description: You gain +2 AC until the start of your next turn.

features.name: Melee Attack
features.description: Melee: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

features.name: Shield Slam
features.description: Save: DC 16 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is knocked prone.

features.name: Covering Strike
features.description: Melee: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: An ally within 15 ft. of you may spend their reaction to move up to half their speed.

features.name: Rend
features.description: Melee: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The creature gains 12 (2d10 + 1) ongoing slashing damage, save ends (DC 14 CON).

features.name: Victory Roar
features.description: Save: DC 14 vs CHA, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) psychic damage and the creature is frightened, save ends (DC 12 CHA).

features.name: Shield Block
features.description: When an adjacent creature would be hit by a ranged weapon attack, you can grant that creature +5 AC against the attack. You must a) be wielding a shield and b) be able to see the source of the attack.
